sn23.13:1.2: Seated to one side, Venerable Rādha said to the Buddha:
sn23.13:1.3: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘impermanence’.
sn23.13:1.5: “Rādha, form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are impermanent.
sn23.13:1.7: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
